title: Dummy E-Commerce Webiste
description: Exploring web development with a dummy e-commerce website. This project includes user registration, login, product viewing, cart management, and a basic checkout process. The admin section allows easy manipulation of products. Dive into the world of web development with this simple and hands-on project.

title: Personal Blog Website
description: Crafted a personal blog website showcasing my passion for technology and creativity. Implemented features like user authentication, article creation, and commenting. The responsive design ensures an optimal reading experience on various devices.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: Developed a fitness tracking app to help users monitor their workouts and nutrition. The app features a user-friendly interface, workout log, meal planner, and progress analytics. Available on both Android and iOS platforms.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a sleek personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and achievements. Implemented smooth animations and a user-friendly layout for an engaging user experience.

title: Social Media Platform
description: Created a social media platform with features like user profiles, posts, comments, and real-time notifications. Implemented a responsive design to provide a seamless experience across devices.

title: Online Clothing Store
description: Developed an online clothing store with a user-friendly interface for browsing, product details, and seamless checkout. Integrated payment gateway for secure transactions and implemented a responsive design for optimal user experience.
technology: HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Stripe

title: Travel Exploration App
description: Developed a travel exploration app to help users discover new destinations, plan itineraries, and share travel experiences. The app features a user-friendly interface, real-time weather updates, and a community forum for travelers.
technology: React Native, Firebase, Google Maps API

title: Music Streaming Platform
description: Designed and developed a music streaming platform with features like user playlists, song recommendations, and a clean audio player interface. Integrated a secure authentication system for user accounts.
technology: HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Spotify API

title: Event Management System
description: Developed an event management system to streamline the process of organizing and managing events. The system includes features for event creation, registration, ticketing, and attendee management.
